dataList.name: Hellterfly’s Dream
dataList.desc:
After inflicting Burn via skill effects to an already Burned enemy, randomly inflict a total of 3 Burn to all enemies.

When activating Wrath Absolute Resonance, randomly inflict a total of 5 Burn to all enemies at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Perversion
dataList.desc:
After defeating an enemy by using a skill, gain 1 E.G.O resource of that skill’s Affinity.

If said skill’s Affinity was Wrath, gain 1 E.G.O resource of all Affinities that the user has instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: +1 E.G.O resource of the used skill’s Affinity
+1 E.G.O resource for all Affinities of the user

dataList.name: Ashes to Ashes
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, if all enemies (or all Abnormality parts) have Burn, inflict 2 Burn on all enemies.

dataList.name: Phlebotomy Pack
dataList.desc:
After dealing damage to enemies by using skills, heal 7.5% of the character’s missing HP. (Once per character per turn.)

If the skill’s Affinity was Wrath, heal 15% of missing HP instead.

dataList.name: Wound Clerid
dataList.desc: After dealing damage to enemies by using a Wrath or Bleed-effect skill, inflict 3 Bleed on the targets.

dataList.name: Coffee and Cranes
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, gain 1 E.G.O resource of a random Affinity that wasn’t used last turn.

If a Lust skill was used last turn, gain 1 E.G.O resource of every Affinity that wasn’t used last turn instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: +1 E.G.O resource of a random applicable Affinity
+1 E.G.O resource of all applicable Affinities

dataList.name: Eclipse of Scarlet Moths
dataList.desc:
Each turn, when dealing damage with a skill for the first time, deal half its damage as fixed damage to a random enemy.

If the skill’s Affinity was Lust, deal said damage to two random enemies instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal fixed damage based on skill damage
Deal fixed damage based on skill damage

dataList.name: Grimy Iron Stake
dataList.desc:
After dealing damage using a single-Coin skill, inflict 1 Bleed and 2 Defense Level Down on the target.

If the target already has Bleed, inflict 3 Bleed in addition.

dataList.name: Fiery Down
dataList.desc:
After dealing damage to enemies using a Lust or Burn-effect skill, inflict 3 Burn on the targets.

If the enemy had 20+ Burn at the start of the turn, double their current Burn.

dataList.name: Bloody Gadget
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, apply 2 Damage Up to a random ally.

Prioritizes allies with Lust skills; apply an additional 1 Damage Up to said allies.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 2 Damage Up; if possessing a Lust skill, gain 1 more

dataList.name: Sunshower
dataList.desc:
When activating Sloth Absolute Resonance or using a skill that attacks multiple targets:

All allies gain +2 Skill Power at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Today’s Expression
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy by using a Sloth or Blunt damage skill, the ally’s Blunt Skill Power is boosted by 2 until the end of next turn.

dataList.name: Talisman Bundle
dataList.desc:
After dealing 12+ HP damage with a single skill, inflict 2 Rupture on the target.

If the skill dealt Slash damage, inflict 4 Rupture instead.

dataList.name: Rusty Commemorative Coin
dataList.desc:
If the first single-Coin skill that an ally uses during the combat phase doesn’t defeat any enemies, use it one more time.

After defeating an enemy by using a Sloth or single-Coin skill, the character gains +1 Skill Power next turn.

dataList.name: Blood, Sweat, and Tears
dataList.desc:
Skills deal +10% damage to Staggered enemies.

If the skill’s Affinity is Sloth, deal +20% damage instead.

dataList.name: Green Spirit
dataList.desc: After damaging a non-Staggered enemy by using a Gluttony skill, or inflicting Tremor using skill effects, randomly inflict a total of 4 Tremor on all enemies.

dataList.name: Lithograph
dataList.desc:
Whenever an enemy is Staggered, the ally with the least HP heals 5% of their Max HP.

If said ally has Gluttony skills, heal 10% of Max HP instead.

dataList.name: Crown of Roses
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, inflict 4 Rupture on a random enemy.

When activating Gluttony Absolute Resonance, inflict 2 Rupture on all enemies at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Sticky Muck
dataList.desc: After dealing damage by using a Gluttony or Pierce damage skill, inflict 2 Defense Level Down on the target.

dataList.name: White Gossypium
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, un-Stagger enemies, and inflict (8 + Stagger LV x 4) Bleed on them, then inflict +2 Bleed Count.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict (8 + Stagger LV x 4) Bleed and apply +2 Bleed Count

dataList.name: Blue Zippo Lighter
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, gain 1 Gloom E.G.O resource and 1 E.G.O resource of 2 other random Affinities.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: +1 Gloom E.G.O resource, +1 E.G.O resource of 2 other random Affinities

dataList.name: Phantom Pain
dataList.desc:
Skills deal +15% damage to single targets.

When activating Gloom Absolute Resonance, apply 2 Offense Level Up to all allies at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Thunderbranch
dataList.desc: When inflicting Rupture using skill effects, inflict 1 additional Rupture and increase its Count by 1.

dataList.name: Melty Eyeball
dataList.desc: Inflict 5 Defense Level Down on enemies affected by Tremor’s burst.

dataList.name: Grey Coat
dataList.desc:
When using a multi-target skill, increase its damage by 20%.

After dealing damage with a Gloom or multi-target skill, heal by 20% of the damage dealt.

dataList.name: Late-bloomer’s Tattoo
dataList.desc: After dealing damage with a Pride or single-Coin skill, gain 2 Offense Level Up and 2 Defense Level Up.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 2 Offense Level Up & 2 Defense Level Up

dataList.name: Lowest Star
dataList.desc:
After dealing Blunt damage, deal 5 SP damage to the target.

If the skill’s Affinity was Pride, deal an additional 3 SP damage.

dataList.name: Prejudice
dataList.desc:
At the start of the 3rd turn, the ally with the least HP heals 15% of their Max HP.

When activating Pride Absolute Resonance, the ally with the least HP heals 10% of their missing HP at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Little and To-be-Naughty Plushie
dataList.desc:
Deal +10% damage and take -20% damage against enemies with Bleed.

Allies with Pride skills deal +20% damage and take -30% damage against enemies with Bleed.

dataList.name: Gathering Skulls
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy by using a Pride or Pierce damage skill, gain 2 Pierce Power Up for 2 turns.

dataList.name: Nixie Divergence
dataList.desc:
At the start of the battle, inflict 4 Tremor with 4 Count on all enemies.

When dealing damage with an Envy skill, inflict 2 Tremor on the target.

dataList.name: Dreaming Electric Sheep
dataList.desc:
After defeating an enemy by using an Envy or Slash damage skill, gain 2 Slash Power Up for 2 turns.

When activating Envy Absolute Resonance, apply 2 Offense Level Up and 2 Defense Level Up to all allies at the start of the combat phase.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 2 Offense Level Up & 2 Defense Level Up

dataList.name: Standard-duty Battery
dataList.desc:
When dealing damage using skills, inflict 3 Rupture.

If the skill’s Affinity was Envy, inflict an additional 2 Rupture.

dataList.name: Pinpoint Logic Circuit
dataList.desc: When dealing damage using an Envy or Burn-effect skill, inflict additional Burn by half the skill’s total Coins. (Rounded up.)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict Burn by half the skill’s total coins

dataList.name: Voodoo Doll
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, deal 3 fixed damage to all enemies.

Enemies with 33% or less HP are inflicted with 1 Attack Power Down.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal 3 fixed damage and inflict 1 Attack Power Down

dataList.name: Carmilla
dataList.desc: At the start of the battle, non-Abnormality enemies take fixed damage equal to 20% of their Max HP.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal 20% of Max HP as fixed damage

dataList.name: Child within a Flask
dataList.desc: At the start of the battle, gain 1 E.G.O resource for every Sin Affinity.

dataList.name: Illusory Hunt
dataList.desc: When entering an Abnormality combat encounter, apply 2 Damage Up to all allies.

dataList.name: Homeward
dataList.desc: When entering a combat encounter, all participating allies heal 12% of their Max HP.

dataList.name: Tomorrow’s Fortune
dataList.desc: Increase the number of options by 1 when choosing an E.G.O Gift to get.

dataList.name: Red Order
dataList.desc:
Whenever an ally inflicts Sinking on enemies with skills, the ally gains 1 Offense Level Up next turn. (Max 3)

Allies with Wrath skills gain 2 Offense Level Up instead. (Max 4)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 1 Offense Level Up next turn (Max 3)
Gain 2 Offense Level Up next turn (Max 4)

dataList.name: Smokes and Wires
dataList.desc:
Allies inflict twice as much Bleed with skills.

At the end of the turn, enemies with Bleed lose 2 Speed next turn.

dataList.name: Employee Card
dataList.desc:
Activate the following with Wrath Absolute Resonance or if any allies use a skill whose effect gives Charge Count:

All allies gain +3 Charge Count at the start of the next turn. (Once per turn)

dataList.name: Oscillating Bracelet
dataList.desc:
Whenever an ally deals HP damage to enemies with a skill, inflict 1 Tremor on the target next turn.

If the skill's Affinity was Wrath, inflict 2 Tremor instead.

dataList.name: Glimpse of Flames
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, enemies with 30+ Burn take fixed damage by (Burn * Burn Count).

For Abnormalities, if the total sum of Burn on every Part is 60 or higher, the Burn-inflicted Part with the highest Max HP takes fixed damage by (Total Burn * the Burn Count Average of Burn-inflicted Parts).

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal fixed damage by (Burn * Burn Count)
Deal fixed damage by (Total Burn * the Burn Count Average of Burn-inflicted Parts)

dataList.name: Cigarette Holder
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, allies with Poise gain +1 Final Power.

Allies with 5+ Poise Count gain +2 Final Power instead.

dataList.name: Barbed Snare
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, inflict Rupture on all enemies equal to their current Speed values.

When activating Lust Absolute Resonance, inflict 3 Rupture and +3 Rupture Count on a random enemy at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Rusted Cutting Knife
dataList.desc:
Whenever an ally inflicts Bleed on a non-Staggered enemy with skills, inflict 1 Bleed and +1 Bleed Count on the target.

If the skill's Affinity was Lust, inflict 3 Bleed and +1 Bleed Count instead.

dataList.name: Thorny Path
dataList.desc:
After dealing HP damage with a skill that inflicts Sinking, inflict 3 Sinking and +2 Sinking Count on the target at the end of the turn. (Once per enemy per turn.)

When activating Lust Absolute Resonance, inflict 2 Sinking and +3 Sinking Count on all enemies (for Abnormalities, one random Part) at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Red-stained Gossypium
dataList.desc:
At the start of the battle, inflict 1 Bleed and +15 Bleed Count on all enemies. (For Abnormalities, all Parts.)

At the start of the turn, enemies with Bleed have their Offense Level and Defense Level reduced by (Bleed / 3) for the turn. (Max 30)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Offense Level and Defense Level reduced by (Bleed / 3) for the turn. (Max 30)

dataList.name: Stone Tomb
dataList.desc:
Allies gain 1.5x Poise from skills.

When an ally defeats an enemy with a Sloth skill, they gain 2 Poise and +2 Poise Count next turn. (Once per turn)

dataList.name: Portable Battery Socket
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, 2 random allies gain +2 Charge Count.

When activating Sloth Absolute Resonance, one random ally gains +3 Charge Count at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Dust to Dust
dataList.desc:
At the start of the battle, inflict 2 Burn and +2 Burn Count on all enemies. (For Abnormalities, one random Part.)

When activating Sloth Absolute Resonance, inflict 2 Burn and +2 Burn Count on all enemies (for Abnormalities, one random Part) at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Melted Spring
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, enemies with Sinking have their Offense Level and Defense Level reduced by 3 for the turn.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Offense Level and Defense Level reduced by 3 for the turn

dataList.name: Downpour
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, inflict (Current Turn * 2) Tremor and +2 Tremor Count on all enemies. (For Abnormalities, all Parts.)

At the end of the turn, burst Tremor on all enemies.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict (Current Turn * 2) Tremor and +2 Tremor Count

dataList.name: Four-leaf Clover
dataList.desc:
When an ally with Poise lands a critical hit on an enemy with a skill, gain 5 Poise and +2 Poise Count next turn. (Once per turn)

If the skill's affinity was Gluttony, gain 7 Poise and +3 Poise Count instead.

dataList.name: Nightvision Goggles
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, activate the following if an ally has 15+ Charge Count:

At the start of the combat phase, the ally loses 3 Charge Count and gains 5 Offense Level for the turn.

dataList.name: Disk Fragment
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, gain 1 E.G.O resource of a random Affinity for each non-Gluttony E.G.O skill used last turn.

If a Gluttony-affinity E.G.O skill was used, gain 3 E.G.O resources of a random Affinity for each Gluttony E.G.O skill used last turn.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: E.G.O resource +1 for a random Affinity
E.G.O resource +3 for a random Affinity

dataList.name: Midwinter Nightmare
dataList.desc:
Whenever an ally deals HP damage to enemies with a skill, inflict 3 Sinking on the target.

If the skill's Affinity was Gluttony, inflict 5 Sinking instead.

dataList.name: Thrill
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, inflict 3 Rupture and +3 Rupture Count on all enemies. (For Abnormalities, all Parts.)

At the end of the turn, all enemies with 3+ Rupture Count (for Abnormalities, each Part is considered individually) take fixed damage by (Rupture * Rupture Count), and reduce Rupture Count by 2.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal fixed damage by (Rupture * Rupture Count), then reduce Rupture Count by 2

dataList.name: Skeletal Crumbs
dataList.desc:
Deal +12.5% damage and take -12.5% damage against enemies that had Sinking at the start of the combat phase.

Allies with Gloom skills deal +20% damage and take -20% damage instead.

dataList.name: Curriculum Vitae
dataList.desc:
At the end of the turn, allies with 7+ Charge Count gain 1 Haste next turn.

If the ally has Gloom skills, gain 2 Haste and 1 Final Power Up instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 2 Haste and 1 Final Power Up next turn

dataList.name: Pendant of Nostalgia
dataList.desc:
At the start of the combat phase, a random ally gains 3 Poise.

Prioritizes allies with Gloom skills; those allies gain 3 Poise and +2 Poise Count.

dataList.name: Broken Revolver
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, enemies with Rupture have their Offense Level reduced by 3 for the turn.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Offense Level reduced by 3 for the turn

dataList.name: Artistic Sense
dataList.desc:
Deal +35% damage against enemies suffering negative effects (Low Morale, Panic) from SP loss.

When Sinking's effect applies to enemies without Sanity, the affinity of the damage inflicted changes to whatever is the most effective.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Damage affinity changes to the most effective one

dataList.name: Nebulizer
dataList.desc:
At the start of the battle, all allies gain 4 Poise and +4 Poise Count.

When activating Pride Absolute Resonance, all allies gain 2 Poise and +2 Poise Count.

dataList.name: Special Contract
dataList.desc: Enemies Staggered by taking damage also receive fixed damage by 33% of their Max HP (for Abnormalities, the Part's HP), and are inflicted with 2 Fragile next turn. (Once per battle)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal 33% of Max HP as fixed damage; Inflict 2 Fragile next turn

dataList.name: Grand Welcome
dataList.desc:
At the start of the battle, gain +5 Pride E.G.O resources.

Whenever an enemy dies, gain +2 Pride E.G.O resources and +1 E.G.O resource for 2 other random affinities.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain +2 Pride E.G.O resources and +1 E.G.O resource of 2 other random Affinities

dataList.name: Wrist Guards
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, allies with 5+ Charge Count gain 1 Damage Up.

If the ally has Pride skills, gain 2 Damage Up instead.

dataList.name: Clear Mirror, Calm Water
dataList.desc:
Greatly increase the damage of critical hits that allies land.

If a critical hit consumes Poise Count, the ally gains 2 Base Power Up next turn.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 2 Base Power Up next turn

dataList.name: Charred Disk
dataList.desc:
When an enemy (for Abnormalities, the targeted Part) with Burn is defeated, half of the Burn is inflicted on the enemy with the least Burn at the start of the next turn. (Rounded up)

At the start of the turn, enemies with Burn have their Offense Level reduced by 4 for the turn.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict half of Burn the defeated enemy had
Offense Level reduced by 4 for the turn

dataList.name: Lightning Rod
dataList.desc:
At the start of the battle, all allies gain +3 Charge Count.

If two or more allies participating in battle have Envy skills, all allies gain +5 Charge Count instead.

dataList.name: Endorphin Kit
dataList.desc:
When gaining Poise using skills, gain 1 Poise and +1 Poise Count.

If the skill's affinity was Envy, gain 2 Poise and +2 Poise instead.

dataList.name: Headless Portrait
dataList.desc:
At the start of the combat phase, inflict 2 Sinking on all enemies with less than 0 SP. (In the case of Abnormalities, one random part)

For each Envy skill used, inflict 1 Sinking between all enemies (In the case of Abnormalities, one random part) next turn.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict 1 Sinking between all enemies next turn

dataList.name: Charge-type Gloves
dataList.desc:
Max Charge Count +10

At the start of the battle, all allies gain +5 Charge Count.

dataList.name: First-aid Kit
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, one ally under 50% HP heals 25% of Max HP. (Once per battle; does not activate if the ally is dead)

dataList.name: Painkiller
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, Staggered allies heal by 12.5% of Max HP and gain 3 Protection.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal by 12.5% of Max HP; Gain 3 Protection

dataList.name: Voracious Hammer
dataList.desc: After winning a combat encounter, gain 3 Cost for each enemy defeated.

dataList.name: Golden Urn
dataList.desc: Gain +20% Cost after winning a combat encounter. (Not affected by starter buffs or other E.G.O Gifts)

dataList.name: Milepost of Survival
dataList.desc: When moving to the next floor, all Identities heal by 8% of Max HP, and gain 87 Cost.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal by 8% of Max HP; Gain 87 Cost

dataList.name: Faith
dataList.desc: When using a skill that flips Plus Coins, the ally's SP applies as the maximum value at the start of the next turn (unless corroded).

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: SP applied as the max value

dataList.name: Piece of Relationship
dataList.desc: Cost requirement for deploying Identities or E.G.O reduced by 30%.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal 20% of Max HP as fixed damage

dataList.name: Lunar Memory
dataList.desc: All type and affinity resistances of enemies (for Abnormalities, all Parts) change to 'Fatal'.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Type and affinity resistances change to 'Fatal'

dataList.name: Entry Ticket
dataList.desc: Combat Participant Limit +1

dataList.name: Golden Entry Ticket
dataList.desc: Combat Participant Limit +2
